page.title: 01SUTTON HOO/Sutton Village
page.content:
{This rural area bordered on the {west by the River Deben is mainly used {for arable farming, although there {are a few areas of woodland and {marshland.
Towards the east of the block is {R.A.F. Woodbridge,}an American Air Force Base.
{To the South is the small village of SUTTON.{It is a very picturesque {village and typical of those in the {Woodbridge area.
In the North corner is the{Sutton Hoo archaeological site where ancient Burial mounds are being excavated. Work has been carried out here since the 1930's.
